blocks.title: This next set of questions are about your qualifications
blocks.description: Include any formal qualifications you have ever achieved in England, Wales or elsewhere, even if you are not using them now.

titles.value: Has {{ [answers['first-name'], answers['last-name']] | format_household_name }} completed an apprenticeship?
Have you completed an apprenticeship?

content.title: Include equivalent apprenticeships completed anywhere outside England and Wales

titles.value: Has {{ [answers['first-name'], answers['last-name']] | format_household_name }} achieved a qualification at degree level or above?
Have you achieved a qualification at degree level or above?

content.title: Include equivalent qualifications completed anywhere outside England and Wales

options.label: Yes
options.description: For example degree, foundation degree, HND or HNC, NVQ level 4 and above, teaching or nursing

options.label: No
options.description: Questions on NVQs, A levels, GCSEs and equivalents will follow

titles.value: Has {{ [answers['first-name'], answers['last-name']] | format_household_name }} achieved an NVQ or equivalent qualification?
Have you achieved an NVQ or equivalent qualification?

content.title: Include equivalent qualifications completed anywhere outside England and Wales

options.label: NVQ level 3 or equivalent
options.description: For example BTEC National, OND or ONC, City and Guilds Advanced Craft

options.label: NVQ level 2 or equivalent
options.description: For example BTEC General, City and Guilds Craft

options.label: None of these apply
options.description: Questions on A levels, GCSEs and equivalents will follow

titles.value: Has {{ [answers['first-name'], answers['last-name']] | format_household_name }} achieved an AS, A level or equivalent qualification?
Have you achieved an AS, A level or equivalent qualification?

content.title: Include equivalent qualifications completed anywhere outside England and Wales

options.label: 2 or more A levels
options.description: Include 4 or more AS levels

options.label: 1 A level
options.description: Include 2 to 3 AS levels

options.label: None of these apply
options.description: Questions on GCSEs and equivalents will follow

titles.value: Has {{ [answers['first-name'], answers['last-name']] | format_household_name }} achieved a GCSE or equivalent qualification?
Have you achieved a GCSE or equivalent qualification?

content.title: Include equivalent qualifications completed anywhere outside England and Wales

options.label: 5 or more GCSEs grades A* to C or 9 to 4
options.description: Include 5 or more O level passes or CSEs grades 1

options.label: Any other GCSEs
options.description: Include any other O levels or CSEs at any grades

options.label: Basic skills
options.description: Skills for life, literacy, numeracy and language

titles.value: Has {{ [answers['first-name'], answers['last-name']] | format_household_name }} achieved any formal qualifications?
Have you achieved any formal qualifications?

options.label: Yes, anywhere outside of England and Wales
options.value: Yes, anywhere outside of England and Wales

content.title: Include casual or temporary work, even if only for one hour

options.label: Doing any other kind of paid work
options.value: Doing any other kind of paid work

blocks.description: Thank you for taking part in the 2017 Census Test.

content.title: Please note:
list: by submitting your responses, you are declaring that you have completed to the best of your knowledge and belief.
if you do not submit, your responses will be automatically submitted when the Census 2017 Test closes.
after submission you will have an opportunity to provide feedback on your experience.
